title: House Committees to Subpoena White House for Ukraine-Related Records
text:
WASHINGTON—The House committees at the heart of an investigation into whether to impeach President Trump over his effort to enlist Ukraine to probe Democratic rival Joe Biden said that they planned to issue a subpoena on Friday to force the White House to turn over records related to a pair of phone calls between Mr. Trump and Ukraine’s president.

Democrats leading the House intelligence, oversight and foreign-affairs committees said that they planned to direct it to acting White House chief of staff Mick Mulvaney.

...
description: The House committees at the heart of an impeachment inquiry of President Trump said that they planned to issue a subpoena on Friday to force the White House to turn over records related to a pair of phone calls between Mr. Trump and Ukraine’s president.
